}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== '''This Product is no longer available, it has been replaced by [[Compex WLE900V5-27]]'''
{{CompexMailKimp}}
Per '''Compex''''s datasheet, this device is based on the XB143 reference design.
===Additional data, per Compex's datasheet=== {{802dot11 RxSens|11a |info= |6M=-94 |9M=-94 |12M=-94 |18M=-92 |24M=-89 |36M=-86 |48M=-82 |54M=-80 }}
